text: hi <@UEKMY50SU> thanks for your reply! but I already installed the relevant libraries of pdfkit on HubSpot serverless still cannot work and show above error. and I tried  on AWS Lambda it's work fine.
looking more closely, it seems that the error is coming from within `webpack_require` so it could be an issue with webpack or and issue with the library. how did you test this on AWS Lambda?
you could also consider testing out the serverless beta so you don't have to depend on webpack: <https://HubSpotdev.slack.com/archives/C011F74BKQW/p1614090633018100>
